name: False certificates
text: §286-30  False certificates.  Any person who makes, issues, or knowingly uses any imitation or counterfeit of an official certificate of inspection, or any person who displays or causes or permits to be displayed upon any vehicle any certificate of inspection knowing the same to be issued for another vehicle or issued without an inspection having been made or issued without authority as provided herein shall be fined not more than $1,000 or imprisoned not more than thirty days, or both. [L 1967, c 214, pt of §2; HRS §286-30; am L 1998, c 287, §1]
